Name: LU 586 - Planning, SUNSET PARK LIBRARY, 5108 4th Avenue, Brooklyn (C 170099 PQK)
Title: Resolution approving the decision of the City Planning Commission on ULURP No. C 170099 PQK (L.U. No. 586), for the acquisition of property located at 5108 4th Avenue (Block 798, Lot 34), for use as a library, in Community District 7, Borough of Brooklyn.

History.Description: This Resolution was Approved by Committee
A motion was made that this Resolution be Approved, by Council approved by consent Roll Call.

\v0\par
\pard\ltrpar\keepn\nowidctlpar\s1\qj\tx864\tx2016\tx3168\tx4320\tx5472\tx6624\tx7776\tx8928 By Council Members Greenfield and Salamanca\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx864\tx2016\tx3168\tx4320\tx5472\tx6624\tx7776\tx8928\b0\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj WHEREAS, the City Planning Commission filed with the Council on February 3, 2017 its decision dated February 1, 2017 (the "Decision") on the application submitted pursuant to Section 197-c of the New York City Charter by the Brooklyn Public Library (BPL) and the New York City Department of Citywide Administrative Services (DCAS), for the acquisition of property located at 5108 4\super th\nosupersub  Avenue (Block 798, Lot 34), in the Sunset Park neighborhood of Brooklyn for use as the Sunset Park Branch Public Library (the "Site").  This action, in conjunction with other related actions would \expndtw-3 facilitate the development of \expndtw0 an eight-story mixed-use building containing approximately 50 units of affordable housing and an expanded public library, (ULURP No. C 170099 PQK), Community District 7, Borough\expndtw-5  of Brooklyn\expndtw0  (the "Application");\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj WHEREAS, the application is related to Applications C 170097 HAK (L.U. No. 584); and C 170098 PPK (L.U. No. 585); \par
\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx720\tx864\tx2016\tx3168\tx4320\tx5472\tx6624\tx7776\tx8928\tab WHEREAS, the Decision is subject to review and action by the Council pursuant to Section 197-d(b)(3) of the City Charter;\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx864\tx2016\tx3168\tx4320\tx5472\tx6624\tx7776\tx8928\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj       \tab WHEREAS, upon due notice, the Council held a public hearing on the Decision and Application on March 9, 2017;\par
\par
\tab WHEREAS, the Council has considered the land use implications and other policy issues relating to the Decision and Application; \par
\par
\tab WHEREAS, the Council has considered the relevant environmental issues, including the revised negative declaration (CEQR No. \expndtw-2 16HPD015K\expndtw0 ) issued on August 2, 2016 (the \ldblquote Revised Negative Declaration\rdblquote );\par
\par
RESOLVED:\par
\par
\tab The Council finds that the action described herein will have no significant impact on the environment as set forth in the Revised Negative Declaration.\par
\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx720\tab Pursuant to Section 197-d of the City Charter and on the basis of the Decision and Application, and based on the environmental determination and consideration described in this report, C 170099 PQK, incorporated by reference herein, the Council approves the Decision.\tab\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx864\tx2016\tx3168\tx4320\tx5472\tx6624\tx7776\tx8928 Adopted.\par
\par
      \tab Office of the City Clerk, \}\par
      \tab The City of New York,  \} ss.:\par
\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx864\tx1800\tx2016\tx3168\tx4320\tx5472\tx6624\tx7776\tx8928     \tab      \tab  I hereby certify that the foregoing is a true copy of a Resolution passed by The Council of The City of New York on March 16, 2017, on file in this office.\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qr\tx864\tx2016\tx3168\tx4320\tx5472\tx6624\tx7776\tx8928\par
